author: Dana Souza
text:
I am seeking information from public agencies that have successfully constructed a trail/greenway through a golf course or, along the edge of the golf course where golf course land was needed to build the project. 
If you have built a similar project or are designing one, I’d love to hear about your partnerships, successes and challenges. I’m particularly interested in projects where the golf course is privately owned. 
Thank you!
title: Trails/Greenways Passing Through Golf Course Property
